t_korean: ^[Event] Deliver the story of the rice cake to rabbit researcher Kelly^
^Mochi Rabbit^

^There is a scholar named Kelly who studies rabbits near the Elgrain farmland. Rumor has it that Kelly made rice cake balls similar to mine into rice cake rabbits!! Can she tell me some of my situation?^
^She must be hanging out near Elgrain farmland to study rabbits.^
^Hi ? You know I study rabbits! I know the story of the rice cakes. Wait... there must be a way to turn them into rabbits!^
^[Event] How to become a rice cake rabbit 1^
^Research Scholar Kelly^
^In order to make an experimental medicine that can make Mochi Rabbit
column3: you first need moist glutinous rice that Mochi Rabbit likes. Harvest fresh rice in the Elgrain farm area and bring me moist glutinous rice^

t_korean: ^Fresh rice can be harvested from the Elgrain farmland.^
^This amount should be enough to make an experimental drug? thank you !^
^[Event] How to become a rice cake rabbit 2^
^Research Scholar Kelly^

^I need the most important Fairy Pearl feathers to make an experimental potion that can make a rice cake rabbit. Catch the Fairy Pearls that sometimes appear in Elgrain Farm and bring them feathers. Fairy Pearl's feathers fly away quickly
column3: so you must bring them back as soon as possible.^

t_korean: ^Still haven't found Fairy Pearl? There was news that they sometimes appeared in the Elgrain farm area..^
^Did you really catch Fairy Pearl?! It's amazing.. It's a very shiny feather that I've only heard about!! wait a munite ! I'll try to make a mutagen soon.^
^[Event] Experimental drug injection for rice cakes^
^Mochi^
^OK! Here's an experimental drug that can turn rice cakes into rabbits. I'm not sure yet
column3: but would you like to take this test drug and drop it on Mochi? There will be a response soon.^

t_korean: ^Quickly inject the rice cake with the test drug I gave you!^

^(Torruk.TtukTtuk)
Ugh OMG !! I can feel the sensation all over my body!!! The rumors that mochi balls turned into mochi rabbits were true!! Thank you so much !^
^[Event] Deliver the effect of the experimental drug to Kelly^
^Research Scholar Kelly^
^I think I can really become a rice cake rabbit if I inject this experimental drug periodically!! Can you hurry up and tell Kelly that the experimental drug is working?^
^Hurry up and tell Kelly that the experimental drug is working!^
^I'm so glad that the experimental medicine I made works! From now on
column3: let's continuously inject experimental medicine into the rice cake. I'm sure you can turn into a rice cake rabbit.^

^Thanks . I'll make an experimental potion that will turn a bunch of rice cakes into rabbits!^

^(Huh)
You seem to know about my situation.. Will you listen to my concerns?^
^Nel has been with me all her life and I still love her.. But at some point she lost her memory and no matter how many doctors she went to
column3: she couldn't find the cause for her losing memory. It's so upsetting to see her not running into her.^

t_korean: ^If I can get her memories back I'll do everything I can..^
^[Event] Encounter Nell in person^
^Awesome^
^You think I'm lying?..Then go ask her who I am.. Maybe she rather knows me as a weirdo..^
^Nell is always by her side
column3: but she doesn't know that I'm always by her side..^

t_korean:
^(Greetings to Nell)
Hi. Nice to meet you.^
^[Event] Deliver Nell's status to Asop^
^nel^

^Asop ?! (Tilts head.)
Who is Dodaechae Asop??
Are you referring to the person who kept sobbing when he saw me from the other day?.. There must be a sad story.. You go and comfort him..^
^A boy named Asop must have had a really sad story. you go and comfort me^

^Look at this. She can't remember me anymore..
It hurts so much.. Is there any way to get her memories back?^
^[Event] Meeting with the Memories Collector^
^Asop^
^It would be great if I could bring her memories back to her happy memories. If what you said is true
column3: you might be able to bring back memories! Quickly convey my circumstances to the memory collector.^

column3: leaving behind invisible fragments of memories... If you collect the fragments of memories that remain in Nell's Unforgettable Memories
column4: you will surely be able to restore Nell's memories. .Tell me about the unforgettable memories Nell has.^

t_korean: ^Tell me about the memories Nell has accumulated.^

These are really good memories that remind me of my childhood..^
^[Event] Memories of Nell - Flowers picked for Agul Kumadori^
^Jack^

^I heard that you and her fellow Kumadori Agul visited the fire-devoured ruins every day to pick her favorite flowers. She should go to that place and pick up the flowers from that time. If her heart is still there
column3: the flower will contain fragments of memories..^

t_korean: ^Hurry up and revisit the fire-devouring ruins and retrieve the flowers you picked back then.^
^Fortunately
column3: it seems that her heart still remembers this flower... I will hand over the memory fragment extracted from this flower to you. Please keep it well.^

^Jack^
^*[Daily] Memories of Nell - Unable to carry out the quest "Picked Flowers for Agul Kumadori" and one day at the same time

t_key: If you visit her fishing spot
t_korean: which you went with her every day
column3: and bring back the snack crucian carp you caught for the Butter Muscat

t_korean: ^According to what you said

t_korean: ^Fortunately

t_korean: ^[Event] Nell's Memories Returned - Kumadori Cave^
^nel^

^What?! You're going to show me your photo album?!
Um...okay
column3: where would you like to show me?^

t_korean:
^What is it ~ They said they were showing a photo album!
Show me quickly. curious^

^(Heh heh..) (Sobbing for a long time..)
I remember everything.. Holding hands with Asop.. Every day I went looking for flowers for my beloved Kumadori.. Thanks for helping me find my memories! Asop and I will give you the Kumadori that I really cherished. I hope you will make unforgettable memories together with this child^
^[Event] Nell's Memories Returned - Buttermuscat^
^nel^

^What?! You're going to show me your photo album?!
Um...okay
column3: where would you like to show me?^

t_korean:
^What is it ~ They said they were showing a photo album!
Show me quickly. curious^

^(Heh heh..) (Sobbing for a long time..)
I remember everything.. Holding hands with Asop.. The memory of going fishing for Buttermuscat's snacks that I cherish every day. ..Thank you for helping me find my memories! Asop and I will present you the buttermuscat that I really cherished. I hope you will also make unforgettable good memories with this child^
^[February only] Spirune and Kumadori Cave^
^Spirune^

^Hi! Did you meet new friends this month?
Actually

I'm recruiting new friends who have been chosen by heroes to go on an adventure!
If it's okay

could you bring them to the sealing stone?

the memories we made together will become a piece of your heart and be with you!

t_korean: ^[Event][Legend]Note left by Nell^
^Asop^
^There is a note that Nell wrote to Agul Kumadori
column3: whom he cherished before he lost his memory
column4: but I can't find it anywhere. Can you find the note?!^

t_korean:
^
Once in a while in the ruins swallowed by fire (legendary)
column3: if you defeat the ancient golem
column4: the afterimage of the Kumadoria Cave must also have Nell's note!^

t_korean: ^Oh .. I'm pretty sure this is the letter Nell gave to Kumadori Agul before she lost her memory! thank you very much^
^[Event] Diaget's Emergency Call^
^Craftsman Diaze^
^Why so late ! I can't see Blossom Beauty
column3: who is nothing but my own child
column4: since last night.. I'm not the kind of person to wander around alone.. can you help^

t_korean: ^You don't want to help me?^
^Oh..! would you really help me?? If you find Blossom Beauty
column3: I will reward you well.^

t_korean: ^[Event] Investigation of Blossom Beauty 1^
^Crafter Diaze^
^Beauty is someone I really care about... Decades ago
column3: I put a pendant around his neck and made him a beautiful guardian of spring who protects this continent... Without Beauty
column4: this Midlas would become jealous and cold-blooded again. I'm going back to the continent.. I must find it.. Go to the guard at Wailing Cliff Village right now and ask about Blossom Beauty's whereabouts.^

t_korean: ^Quickly find the Hakanasu Guard in Wailing Cliff Village.^
^Diaze sent you? I had a lot of trouble coming..^
^[Event] Investigation of Blossom Beauty 2^
^Wailing Cliff Village Guard^

^Isn't Blossom Beauty the guardian deity of spring and beauty created by Diaget by hanging the most expensive taffeta pendant he made himself on the neck of a spring deer? Well... I don't remember seeing it at all. Go see the guard who was on duty last night. He's probably resting at the garrison camp.^
^Still haven't found the garrison camp guard?^
^I heard the news.. Calm down and catch your breath..^
^[Event] Investigation of Blossom Beauty 3^
^Garrison Garrison Guard^
^Is it true that Blossom Beauty is missing?! Without Blossom Beauty
column3: the guardian deity of beauty and spring
column4: Midlas would turn into a jealous and cold-blooded continent again. It's a big deal. The guard in charge of the cave in front of the cave said he witnessed something suspicious last night.. Please visit it.^

t_korean: ^Still haven't found the guard of the veiled cave?^
^Hey... Did Diaze send you by any chance? It's been a lot of trouble.^
^[Event] Full story of the missing incident^
^Veiled Cave Guard^
^I heard that Blossom Beauty went missing.. On the way home from work after finishing work last night
column3: several angry dragonfish hurriedly entered the cave with sacks. It was sticking out.. If I knew that beauty was gone
column4: I would have checked it right away.. It's all my fault.^

t_korean: ^Hurry up and tell Diaze about this.^
^Oh.. You worked hard.. Please let me know quickly about the whereabouts of Blossom Beauty!^
^[Event] Arrested Blossom Beauty Kidnapper^
^Craftsman Diaze^
^If I'm right
column3: the angry Yonggary witnessed by the guards must be Cherry Blossom Karasha controlled by Radan. It's clear that they're plotting to steal it... Go into the cave yourself
column4: defeat the Cherry Blossom Karashas
column5: and find out the truth about their whereabouts! If you destroy Radan's Eye
column6: the Cherry Blossom Karasha will sense the threat and crawl out.^

t_korean: ^You must destroy Ladan's Eye to reveal the Cherry Blossom Karashas.^

^(Looking at the taphite fragments obtained from Cherry Blossom Karasha)
This..This is definitely the remains of the Taphite Pendant I hung around Beauty's neck.. Everything was the work of Radan and Cherry Blossom Karasha. ..^
^[Event] Pendant to rescue beauty^
^Craftsman Diaze^
^You remade the pendant using the tapite pieces you recovered from Cherry Blossom Karasha. I'm not sure if I can tame Beauty again by making it in a hurry
column3: but I hope you succeed and rescue Beauty who was kidnapped somewhere in a mysterious cave. Talk to her again and I'll hand over the pendant to you.^

t_korean: ^Talk to me again when you're ready.^
^The probability of meeting the kidnapped beauty is not very high. If you do
column3: calm down the beauties who have lost their reason and carefully hang this taffeta pendant around her neck. If the gods help us
column4:
I'm sure we'll be able to successfully tame Beauty and get out of the cave safely!!
Wait
column5: before you hit the road
column6: pick one of the corollas and take it with you..This corolla will surely bring you luck. .^

t_korean: ^[Daily] Retrieve Taupite Pendant Material Pieces^
^Crafter Diaze^
^In order to successfully rescue Blossom Beauty
column3: you need to put the Taphite Pendant
column4: a symbol of beauty
column5: back around his neck. You have to defeat Cherry Blossom Karasha in the Veiled Cave (Legendary) right now and bring back the stolen materials for the Tapite Pendant.^

t_korean: ^You must destroy Ladan's Eye to reveal the Sakura Karasha.^
^You worked hard! I'll entrust you with the pieces of tapite that the Sakura Karashas had
column3: so gather all the pendant materials and bring them back to me.^

column3: we need to quickly collect the materials for the pendant.^

column4: we will be able to tame White Blossom Beauty again and get out of the cave safely!! Good luck.^

t_korean: ^[Event] Icarus's 9th Anniversary Festival^
^Noveno^
^I can't believe it's our Icarus' 9th anniversary already! We have prepared a variety of things to do for all of you who have worked hard on the adventure of Icarus! talk to me^
^If you talk to me again
column3: you will be able to enjoy various contents related to the 9th anniversary!^

t_korean: ^Come on! I hope you are ready to enjoy a grand anniversary celebration with me! Now
column3: let's enjoy it together~^

t_korean: ^[Event] Noveno's Ballot Box^
^Noveno^
^Hakanasu Capital City held a large-scale popularity vote to celebrate the 9th anniversary! Because of that
column3: I need a hand to collect the ballot boxes every day. Can you help me? Talk to me again if you can help.^

t_korean: ^If you are ready to help me
column3: talk to me again!^

t_korean: ^Kyaaak~! Are you already feeling reassured that you help? Alright then let's start^
^[Daily] Collect completed Popular Vote Boxes^
^Noveno^
^Now! Please collect all the ballot papers that have been voted in from the popular ballot boxes that have been collected in various places in Hakanasu today!^
^You can get completed ballots by opening the popularity ballot boxes located throughout the Hakanath area.^
^Kyaaak~! great job ! Oh
column3: I guess you couldn't vote because you were helping me. Here
column4: I'll give you the few remaining popularity votes
column5: so vote for your favorite candidate between Crow and Erna behind me.^

t_korean: ^[Event] A regular customer of the business trip merchant^
^Noveno^
^Business travelers from all over the country visit Hakanasu Castle at certain times to celebrate every festival. Don't you want to impress the business travelers and become their regular customers?^
^If you want to impress business travelers and become regular customers
column3: talk to me.^

t_korean: ^Being someone's regulars is a meaningful thing for both of you! If you give the regular customer certificate I gave you to one of the merchants who appear on the street in Hakanasu Capital City
column3: something good will happen~^

t_korean: ^[Daily] Proof to become a regular customer^
^Noveno^

^You said you came today to get a regular certificate to give to the regular merchants of the business trip merchants who appear on the street in Hakanasu Capital City? Wait a minute.. I'll look for it.. Talk to you again.^
^I found the loyalty certificate I kept! talk to me again^
^Now! I hope you become a regular customer of the merchant you want with this regular certificate today.^
^[Event] Dream Box Falls from the Sky^
^Noveno^
^During the 9th anniversary festival
column3: a box of dreams fell in the suspicious Ravini Garden! In the box of dreams
column4: you can get various materials to enjoy the 9th anniversary
column5: and if you are lucky
column6: you can get expensive ones too! In particular
column7: there is a mysterious dream bundle inside. If it's okay
column8: could you open the dream box and bring the dream bundle?^

t_korean: ^You still haven't found the dream box that fell somewhere in the suspicious Lavini Garden?^
^The box of dreams was really full of our dreams!! I hope we can all open the box of dreams and make all our dreams come true.^
^[Daily] Dream box fallen from the sky^
^Noveno^
^Could you open the box of dreams that falls in the mysterious Ravini Garden today and bring us a bundle of dreams?^
^You still haven't found the dream box that fell somewhere in the suspicious Lavini Garden?^
^You worked hard today too! Thanks to you
column3: we will all be able to achieve our dreams!^

t_korean: ^[Event] Mutant Ravish^
^Noveno^
^During the 9th anniversary period
column3: the hybrid fish Lavish
column4: which was created by combining a rabbit and a fish
column5: appeared at Shinryong's fishing ground and Fish Bunny Treasure Island
column6: disturbing the ecosystem! At this rate
column7: Lavish will eat all the fish and swallow them all.^

t_korean: ^You still haven't caught Rabish who is going crazy?^
^This big hybrid fish has been ruining the ecosystem until now!! I hope that your small efforts will gather and restore the chaotic ecosystem!^
^[Daily] Mutant Ravish^
^Noveno^
^If you check today
column3: the number of mutant labyrinths has increased about twice as much!! If we go on like this
column4: Lavish will eat all the fish that live in the water. Hurry up and go to Shinryong's Fishing Site and Fish Bunny Treasure Island to catch Ravish
column5: a hybrid fish that destroys the ecosystem.^

t_korean: ^You still haven't caught Lavish who is going crazy?^
^Thank you for catching the mutant Rabish again today! I hope that your small efforts will gather and restore the chaotic ecosystem!^
^[Event] Black Rabbit Tikitaka^
^Noveno^
^Famous designer Andore said that in order to celebrate the Year of the Black Rabbit
column3: he needs the Sealing Stone of Tiki-Taka
column4: the Black Rabbit
column5: to make the 9th anniversary costume! can i get some help from you Think about it and talk to me again.^

t_korean: ^Are you still not sure about your thoughts? Talk to me again when you've made up your mind.^
^Thank you! I'll give you a black rabbit carrot bait to lure and capture the black rabbit tikitaka! After capturing them using the capture card with this
column3: you can make the 9th anniversary costume material with the sealed sealing stone!^

t_korean: ^[Daily] 9th Anniversary Costume Material Acquisition - Tiki Taka Sealing Stone^
^Noveno^
^I would like you to bring me the Black Rabbit Tikitaka Sealing Stone
column3: which will be used as a material for the 9th anniversary costume today!^

t_korean: ^First of all
column3: you have to capture Tiki-Taka to make the Sealing Stone! To do so
column4: you'll need to lure him with a capture card and Tikitaka's favorite black rabbit carrot bait. By the way
column5: Tiki-Taka must be hanging around outside the walls of Hakanasu Capital City!^

t_korean: ^Thank you so much! Really
column3: this sealing stone can be used as a material for a costume piece! Aren't you curious?^

^You really want to climb the tower of challenge for them?! Thank you

^[April only] Spirune and Erna Doll^
^Spirun^

^Hi! Were you able to meet new friends this month?
Actually
column3:
I'm recruiting new friends who have been chosen by heroes to go on an adventure!
If it's okay
column4:
could you bring them to the sealing stone?
Instead
column5: the memories we made together will become a piece of your heart and be with you!^

t_korean:
^The fragments of memories we had together become the material for meeting Planiago that shines as much as the twinkling memories!
(*Can be exchanged with Fellow Sealing Stones.)^

^Wow! I feel affection for you from this friend!
Even though I will leave you and go on a new adventure
column3: I will continue to be with you as a piece of memory! They said it became an ingredient!^

t_korean: ^[Event] The secret of the man raising rabbits^
^A man raising rabbits^
^Oh my gosh~ My mouth itches.. Hey there young man! Could you please listen to me?^
^These days
column3: young people don't even pretend to listen to what adults say~^

t_korean: ^You will listen to me?! Yes
column3: sit here! (CarpalCarpal) Actually
column4: I am.. I am raising a rabbit that lays eggs!! Haha it's true..!^

t_korean: ^[Event] Adopt a rabbit that lays eggs^
^A man raising rabbits^
^Hey
column3: are you thinking of adopting a rabbit that lays eggs?? Talk to me if you have any ideas.^

t_korean: ^I'm not ready to adopt a laying rabbit yet. Talk to you when you're ready.^
^Thank you so much for adopting this troublemaker! If you raise these guys well
column3: you will be able to get an egg with great power! Good luck to you!^

t_korean: ^[Event]Easter Festival
column3: Mr. Rabbit's Help^

t_korean: ^A man raising rabbits^
^Did you have any big problems raising egg-laying rabbits today? I have prepared something to help you.^
^If you talk to me again
column3: I will present you with one of the eggs in good condition from the egg-laying rabbit.^

t_korean: ^Let's go! This is a collection of only the highest quality eggs laid by rabbits. Pick the one you like.^
